name: Engklek
description: A hopping game played on ground patterns drawn with chalk.

rules: Players hop through boxes on one foot.
Do not step on the lines.

name: Gobak Sodor
description: A traditional team-based chasing and blocking game.

rules: Defenders block paths to prevent attackers from passing.
Attackers must run across lines without being tagged.

name: Congklak
description: A board game using shells or seeds played on a wooden board.

rules: Players take turns distributing seeds into holes.
The one with the most seeds in the store wins.
